name: Salazart Gallery: Selous Exhibit
description:
-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-

Galleries are exclusionary. 

The art world is exclusionary. Elitist. Removed. Unattainable. 

If an artist wants their work to show in a gallery-- they should have that opportunity.

All artists deserve to have a space to show their creations. 

So I made a gallery and anyone can show their work here. 

This exhibit is showing photographs from OnwardRocinante 

If you want your art shown in an exhibit (even if it's just screenshots of your games) leave a comment/DM me on twitter and I'll make you an exhibit of your own. 

Your art deserves a gallery.  

-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-
